di.wi.senewirathna wisin siya chithrapata kalawa granthaye sandahan karana 1901 yanna ehi mul satahanayi.me mathaya pasukalaka boho lipi sadaha mulashra kota ganna bawa penennaki.merata jiwath wu paranithama sinama lekhakayeku menma purogami mehewaraka yeduna senewirathnayan ge athdakim wishalaya.thawath mathayaka aththe eya 1903 wasara bawaya.1901 wasare merata chithrapata pradarshanaya pilibanda pawasana satahan wala aththe eya mulwarata thira gatha karana ladde diyathalawe pawathi yudha kandawure yannaya.me chithrapata pradarshanaya pawathwa aththe ewakata ehi sirakara siti boyar sirakaruwan sandahaya.boyar waru jiwathwuye dakunu aprikaweya.aprikawa brithanya kolaniyak wannata perathuwa eya athpath kara gena siti oolanda,jarmanu ha swidana jathin pasukalaka boyar warun lesa handinwuha.owun aprikawe padinchiyata aawe brithanyan ehi paminennata perathuwaya.

me pilibandawa prajathanthrawadi pakshaye nayaka sarath fonseka mahathagen kala wimasimakadi ee mahatha kiya sitiye me pilibandawa purna helidarawwak thama wisin heta (17) madhya hamuwe sidu karana bawayi.

chih mata pera boho paramparawan ukuth wi atha”yi kenek thama demapiyanta pawasiya.
me siyalu uman kanim sidu kara aththe wiparitha pashana sahitha pa්radeshawala ya.
